New Records: Anthony Davis scored 35 points, the highest for the Lakers this season.
The Lakers achieved a 2-0 start to their season, last seen in the 2010-11 season.
Key Match Events: The Lakers came from behind to win the game.
Austin Reaves and Anthony Davis formed a strong offensive duo with 26 and 35 points respectively.
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers were expected to have a strong performance with Anthony Davis and LeBron James leading the charge.
Coach Steve Kerr emphasized defensive strategies to counter the Suns' pace.
